alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 12 at 1:39PM CST until November 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Monday... .Breezy southerly winds, warm temperatures and low relative humidity values will create multiple hours of critical fire weather conditions across the area late Monday morning through the afternoon hours. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 013, 027, 079, AND 254... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 001 Cheyenne, 013 Sherman, 027 Wallace, 079 Dundy and 254 Cheyenne. * TIMING... Late morning through the afternoon * WINDS...South 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Around 16 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Upper 60s to low 70s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
